properties.areaDesc: Coastal Cameron; Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Coastal Willacy
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 3 at 12:21PM CST until February 3 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 TO 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected
until 3 or 4 pm...with some decrease likely thereafter.

* WHERE...Inland Willacy, Inland Cameron, Coastal Willacy and
Coastal Cameron Counties.

* WHEN...Through 6 PM CST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Minor structural damage, such as to metal
siding and unfastened signs, is possible. Unsecured lightweight
items, including trashcans, lawn furniture, and trampolines,
will be moved by the winds especially in south-facing locations.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects by tying them down or
moving them inside.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING
